data.name: The Huntsman: Winter's Curse (Book 5)
data.detailed_description:
Path of Destruction


Elisabeth flees from the Enchantress, even as the Enchantress seeks to control Elisabeth's power. Marcus follows the path of Elisabeth's magical destruction across the countryside, desperate to find her before the Enchantress does.
data.about_the_game:
Path of Destruction


Elisabeth flees from the Enchantress, even as the Enchantress seeks to control Elisabeth's power. Marcus follows the path of Elisabeth's magical destruction across the countryside, desperate to find her before the Enchantress does.
data.short_description: Path of DestructionElisabeth flees from the Enchantress, even as the Enchantress seeks to control Elisabeth's power. Marcus follows the path of Elisabeth's magical destruction across the countryside, desperate to find her before the Enchantress does.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 3.0GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+ 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 / ATI Radeon HD 5670 or higher with 1GB memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: Intel processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA or ATI with 1 GB memory
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
